i want to take her on vacations one day.

content.text: Hey, I'm a musician who travels a lot for work. I often worry about my cats while I'm gone, how do you deal with that?
I lost my best friend when I was 16, so I've learned to deal with being away from loved ones.
I'm sorry to hear that, but it's good to know you've found a way to cope.
It's all good, I'm grateful for the time I had with him.
I'm sure you are. What do you like to do for fun when you're not working?
I like to watch comedies, drink beer, and eat food. I'm also proud of my ability to stay calm under pressure.
That sounds like a great way to relax. I'm also a big fan of comedies.
Me too! What are some of your favorite comedies?
I love The Office, Parks and Rec, and Arrested Development.
Those are all great shows! I also like The Simpsons, Seinfeld, and It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia.
I've never seen It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a really funny show, you should check it out.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
